text: The following is the list of governors of Uttar Pradesh. ==Lieutenant- governors of the North-Western Provinces and Chief Commissioners of Oudh (1877–1902) == In 1877 the office of lieutenant governor was combined with that of Chief Commissioner of Oudh, which had existed since 1857, in the same person. * Sir George Ebenezer Wilson Couper, 15 February 1877 – 17 April 1882, continued * Sir Alfred Comyn Lyall, 17 April 1882 – 21 November 1887 * Sir Auckland Colvin, 21 November 1887 – 28 November 1892 * Sir Charles Haukes Todd Crosthwaite, 28 November 1892 – 9 January 1895 * Alan Cadell, 9 January 1895 – 6 November 1895, acting * Sir Anthony Patrick MacDonnell, 6 November 1895 – 14 November 1901 * Sir James John Digges La Touche, 14 November 1901 – 22 March 1902 ==Lieutenant-governors of the United Provinces of Agra and Oudh (1902–1921) == In 1902, the province was renamed the United Provinces of Agra and Oudh. With the new name, the former commissionership was abolished. * Sir James John Digges La Touche, 22 March 1902 – 1 January 1907, continued. * Sir John Prescott Hewett, 1 January 1907 – 15 September 1912. **Sir Leslie Alexander Selim Porter, 30 April 1910 – 20 October 1910, acting for Hewett, first time. ** Sir Leslie Alexander Selim Porter, 1 April 1911 – 16 December 1911, acting for Hewett, second time. * Sir James Scorgie Meston, 15 September 1912 – 7 February 1917. **Sir Duncan Colvin Baillie, 18 September 1913 – 15 November 1913, acting for Meston. * John Mitchell Holmes, 7 February 1917 – 15 February 1918, acting. * Sir Spencer Harcourt Butler, 15 February 1918 – 3 January 1921. ==List== # Name Took office Left office English Hindi Governors of United Provinces (1921-14 August 1947) 1 Sir Spencer Harcourt Butler सर हरकोर्ट (स्पेंसर) बटलर 3 January 1921 21 December 1922 2 Sir William S. Marris सर विलियम मॉरिस 21 December 1922 13 August 1926 2 1 December 1926 14 January 1928 3 Sir Alexander Phillips Muddiman सर अलेक्जेंडर फिलिप्स मुद्दिमान 15 January 1928 17 June 1928 4 Sir William Malcolm Hailey सर विलियम मेलकॉम हैले 10 August 1928 21 December 1928 4 22 April 1929 16 October 1930 4 19 April 1931 6 April 1933 4 27 November 1933 5 December 1934 5 Sir Harry Graham Haig सर हैरी ग्रैहम हैग 6 December 1934 16 May 1938 5 17 September 1938 6 December 1939 6 Sir Maurice Garnier Hallett सर मॉरिस गार्नियर हैलट 7 December 1939 6 December 1945 7 Sir Francis Verner Wylie सर फ्रांसिस वर्नर वायली 7 December 1945 14 August 1947 Governors of United Provinces (15 August 1947 – 25 January 1950) 8 Sarojini Naidu सरोजिनी नायडू 15 August 1947 2 March 1949 \- Justice B.B. Malik (Acting) बी. बी. मलिक 3 March 1949 1 May 1949 9 Hormasji Peroshaw Modi एच. पी. मोदी 2 May 1949 25 January 1950 Governors of Uttar Pradesh (26 January 1950–Present) 9 (contd.) Hormasji Peroshaw Mody एच. पी. मोदी 26 January 1950 1 June 1952 10 Kanhaiyalal Maneklal Munshi कन्हैयालाल माणिकलाल मुंशी 2 June 1952 9 June 1957 11 Varahgiri Venkatgiri वराहगिरी वेंकटगिरी 10 June 1957 30 June 1960 12 Burgula Ramakrishna Rao बी. रामकृष्ण राव 1 July 1960 15 April 1962 13 Biswanath Das बिश्वनाथ दास 16 April 1962 30 April 1967 14 Bezwada Gopala Reddy बेजवाड़ा गोपाल रेड्डी 1 May 1967 30 June 1972 – Shashi Kant Varma (Acting) शशि कांत वर्मा 1 July 1972 13 November 1972 15 Akbar Ali Khan अकबर अली खान 14 November 1972 24 October 1974 16 Marri Chenna Reddy मैरी चेन्ना रेड्डी 25 October 1974 1 October 1977 17 Ganpatrao Devji Tapase गणपतराव देवजी तापसे 2 October 1977 27 February 1980 18 Chandeshwar Prasad Narayan Singh चंदेश्वर प्रसाद नारायण सिंह 28 February 1980 31 March 1985 19 Mohammed Usman Arif मोहम्मद उस्मान आरिफ 31 March 1985 11 February 1990 20 B. Satya Narayan Reddy बी. सत्य नारायण रेड्डी 12 February 1990 25 May 1993 21 Motilal Vora मोतीलाल वोरा 26 May 1993 3 May 1996 – Mohammad Shafi Qureshi (Acting) मोहम्मद शफी कुरैशी 3 May 1996 19 July 1996 22 Romesh Bhandari रोमेश भंडारी 19 July 1996 17 March 1998 – Mohammad Shafi Qureshi (Acting) मोहम्मद शफी कुरैशी 17 March 1998 19 April 1998 23 Suraj Bhan सूरज भान 20 April 1998 23 November 2000 24 Vishnu Kant Shastri विष्णु कांत शास्त्री 24 November 2000 2 July 2004 – Sudarshan Agrawal (Acting) सुदर्शन अग्रवाल 3 July 2004 7 July 2004 25 T. V. Rajeswar टी. वी. राजेश्वर 8 July 2004 27 July 2009 26 Banwari Lal Joshi बनवारी लाल जोशी 28 July 2009 17 June 2014 – Aziz Qureshi (acting) अज़ीज़ कुरैशी 17 June 2014 21 July 2014 27 Ram Naik राम नाइक 22 July 2014 28 July 2019 28 Anandiben Patel आनंदीबेन पटेल 29 July 2019 Incumbent ==References==
title: List of governors of Uttar Pradesh
